overview:
EkoBuzz is a web-based mobile and email marketing company, providing clients a range of options from self-service to full service that lets our clients continually inform, entertain and involve their target audience.

Our clients grow their business and increase revenue by reaching out and building relationships and credibility with their customers and prospects. Our clients include

  • Small and medium sized companies looking to outsource their email and mobile marketing efforts, some examples include non-profit organizations, local retail companies like restaurants, florists, shopping malls, etc.
  • Advertising agencies and web designers firms that would like to offer email and mobile marketing as part of thier customerâ€™s integrated marketing plan. Using the EkoBuzz site a user can execute various types of campaigns using outbound text messages/email and inbound responses using mobile short codes. Some examples include 1) Mobile Coupons: Text promotion feature to send discount coupons to the mobile phones of the target audience to improve the chances of a sale. 2) Mobile Voting: Create engaging voting and polling events to encourage customer participation through their mobile phones. 3) Text 2 Win: Engage customers and prospects with interesting fun filled or knowledge based mobile sweepstakes. 4) Mobile Alerts: Keep the target audience informed about products, services, and industry trends using text messages. 5) Email Newsletters: Keep the target audience informed about products, services, and industry trends using email 6) Email Promotions: Send coupons and other promotions of product and services using email.

We offer our clients

  1. A radically simple, relevant solution that is able to send out campaigns based on the target audienceâ€™s location
  2. Superior client service that offers campaign ideas, creating and executing campaigns and product support. We focus on providing this service 24X7, 365 days a year.
  3. Tracking and reporting on marketing campaigns, so our clients can measure the ROI they realize from using our product and services

Our blog is located at www.ekobuzz.com/blogs
